content.title: Kawasaki Disease in Adults
content.description: Medium vessel vasculitis typically affecting children but with recognized adult presentations and long-term sequelae.

clinical_features.adult_presentation: Often incomplete criteria, may be diagnosed late
clinical_features.coronary_involvement: Coronary artery aneurysms may persist into adulthood

vascular_surgery_relevance.coronary_bypass: May require CABG for giant coronary aneurysms
vascular_surgery_relevance.aneurysm_surveillance: Lifetime monitoring for those with childhood KD

content.clinical_pearl: Young adult with coronary aneurysms or unexplained MI - ask about childhood febrile illness
